detail_desc: Fancy dress masks in plastic foam with two elastic straps at the back.
Short skirt in woven fabric with sewn-in creases, a decorative tab and button at the top and a concealed zip and button at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Detachable, braided belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with roll edges at the cuffs and hem and a small fabric appliqué at the bottom.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long-sleeved, fitted top in an airy wool knit with a drawstring in the sides.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Shorter top in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Partial overlap at the top with a tab and metal press-studs on one shoulder and a wrapover with narrow ties at the top and sides.
Imitation leather trainers with decorative metal studs, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared, knee-length skirt in cotton twill with contrasting colour details and an elasticated drawstring waist with a concealed press-stud placket at the front. Side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.

Padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined, detachable hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Lined.

Padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined, detachable hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Lined.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and detachable pile collar. Zip down the front, patch front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and a gathered seam at the back and down the sleeves. Appliqué on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in imitation leather with a detachable, double-layered hood in sweatshirt fabric, quilted sections on the shoulders, a zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a pile-lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Zipped handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with concealed press-studs, inner ribbing at the cuffs and imitation leather details. Partly lined in pile. Polyester filling.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood with imitation leather details and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood with imitation leather details and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Padded jacket in nylon with an appliqué at the top. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.
Padded jacket in nylon with an appliqué at the top. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, a small zipped chest pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, a small zipped chest pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly and press stud, diagonal pockets with hook and loop fastening at the front and one flap back pocket. Snow flaps at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly and press stud, diagonal pockets with hook and loop fastening at the front and one flap back pocket. Snow flaps at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
